languages.text: "Нааки..." {n}Ксиони Эрэбис смотрит на Кибеллу с затаенным страхом. Ее муж, поймав взгляд жены, осторожно качает головой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Нааки..." {n}Ксиони Эрэбис протягивает тонкую руку навстречу Кибелле, но муж перехватывает ее ладонь, прижимает к груди и качает головой. Эрэбисы — проницательные люди. Они давно осознали, кого вы ищете и зачем.{/n}
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

languages.text: "Naaki..." {n}Xioni Erebis looks at Kibellah with scarcely concealed fear, but her husband notices her reaction and shakes his head in warning.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нааки..." {n}Ксиони Эрэбис смотрит на Кибеллу с затаенным страхом. Ее муж, поймав взгляд жены, осторожно качает головой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Naaki..." {n}Xioni Erebis reaches out to Kibellah with her thin arm but her husband catches her hand, holds it to his chest, and shakes his head.{/n}
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

traits.locale_text: "Naaki..." {n}Xioni Erebis reaches out to Kibellah with her thin arm but her husband catches her hand, holds it to his chest, and shakes his head.{/n}

languages.text: « Naaki... » {n}Xioni Erebis regarde Kibellah avec une expression de crainte mal dissimulée, mais son mari remarque sa réaction et secoue la tête en guise d'avertissement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Naaki..." {n}Xioni Erebis looks at Kibellah with scarcely concealed fear, but her husband notices her reaction and shakes his head in warning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Naaki... » {n}Xioni Erebis regarde Kibellah avec une expression de crainte mal dissimulée, mais son mari remarque sa réaction et secoue la tête en guise d'avertissement.{/n}
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

languages.text: «Naaki...». {n}Xioni Erebis mira a Kibellah con un miedo que no logra disimular, pero su marido percibe su reacción y niega con la cabeza en señal de advertencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Naaki..." {n}Xioni Erebis looks at Kibellah with scarcely concealed fear, but her husband notices her reaction and shakes his head in warning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Naaki...». {n}Xioni Erebis mira a Kibellah con un miedo que no logra disimular, pero su marido percibe su reacción y niega con la cabeza en señal de advertencia.{/n}
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

languages.text: 「ナアキ…」{n}シオニ・エレビスは恐怖心を抑えようとする表情でキベラを見るが、彼女の夫はその表情に気づいて警告するように首を振った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Naaki..." {n}Xioni Erebis looks at Kibellah with scarcely concealed fear, but her husband notices her reaction and shakes his head in warning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ナアキ…」{n}シオニ・エレビスは恐怖心を抑えようとする表情でキベラを見るが、彼女の夫はその表情に気づいて警告するように首を振った。{/n}
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

languages.text: “拿基……”{n}肖妮·伊雷比斯看着绮贝菈，脸上带着几乎毫不掩饰的恐惧，但她丈夫注意到了她的反应，警告般地摇了摇头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Naaki..." {n}Xioni Erebis looks at Kibellah with scarcely concealed fear, but her husband notices her reaction and shakes his head in warning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “拿基……”{n}肖妮·伊雷比斯看着绮贝菈，脸上带着几乎毫不掩饰的恐惧，但她丈夫注意到了她的反应，警告般地摇了摇头。{/n}
traits.speaker: Q2_Mother

languages.text: "Naaki ..." {n}Xioni Erebis blickt Kibellah mit kaum verhohlener Furcht an, doch ihr Gemahl bemerkt ihre Reaktion und schüttelt warnend den Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Naaki..." {n}Xioni Erebis looks at Kibellah with scarcely concealed fear, but her husband notices her reaction and shakes his head in warning.{/n}
